Class ControllerViewDual

java.lang.Object
  floatingpoint.livemetadecks.ControllerView
      unused.ControllerViewDual
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModel, IView
public class ControllerViewDual
extends ControllerView
implements IModel

Allows two different controllers to share the same ControllerView.

Author:
floatingpoint
